content:
ActivityExecutionContext Class

In this Article

Represents the execution environment of an Activity. This class cannot be inherited.

Syntax

Declaration

[System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated.  Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")]
public sealed class ActivityExecutionContext : IDisposable, IServiceProvider

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • System.Object
  • ActivityExecutionContext

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
,
Equals(Object,Object)
,
GetHashCode()
,
GetType()
,
MemberwiseClone()
,
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)
,
ToString()

Remarks

Note

This material discusses types and namespaces that are obsolete. For more information, see Deprecated Types in Windows Workflow Foundation 4.5.

Represents the execution environment of an Activity. This class selectively exposes workflow runtime capabilities and services to individual activities. This class cannot be inherited.

For more information, see Understanding the Activity Execution Context.

Fields summary

CurrentExceptionProperty

Represents an exception that has occurred during the execution of the workflow instance. This property has a value only when an activity is in the faulting state.

Properties summary

Activity

Gets the Activity that currently executes within this execution context.
ContextGuid

Gets the ContextID of the associated Activity.
ExecutionContextManager

Gets the ActivityExecutionContextManager associated with this instance.

Methods summary

CancelActivity(Activity)

Called by a composite activity to schedule the cancellation of a child activity. The workflow runtime disallows cancellation of a child activity that is not in the Executing state.
CloseActivity()

Indicates to the workflow runtime that the currently executing activity should transition to the Closed state.
ExecuteActivity(Activity)

Called by a composite activity to schedule the execution of a child activity. The workflow runtime disallows execution of a child activity that is not in the initialized state.
GetService(Type)

Returns a service of the specified type.
GetService<T>()

Returns a service provider of the specified Type.
TrackData(Object)

Invokes the track method for the associated stem.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.Activity*.
TrackData(String,Object)

Invokes the track method for the associated stem.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.Activity*.

Explicit Interface Implementations summary

IDisposable.Dispose()

Releases all resources used by the ActivityExecutionContext.

Fields

  • CurrentExceptionProperty

    Represents an exception that has occurred during the execution of the workflow instance. This property has a value only when an activity is in the faulting state.

    public static readonly System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty CurrentExceptionProperty;

Properties

  • Activity

    Gets the Activity that currently executes within this execution context.

    public System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity Activity { get; }

    Property Value

    • Activity

      The Activity associated to this execution context.

    Exceptions

    • ObjectDisposedException

      This instance is marked for garbage collection.

  • ContextGuid

    Gets the ContextID of the associated Activity.

    public Guid ContextGuid { get; }

    Property Value

    • Guid

      The ContextID of the associated Activity.

  • ExecutionContextManager

    Gets the ActivityExecutionContextManager associated with this instance.

    public System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContextManager ExecutionContextManager { get; }

    Property Value

    • ActivityExecutionContextManager

      the ActivityExecutionContextManager associated with this instance.

Methods

  • CancelActivity(Activity)

    Called by a composite activity to schedule the cancellation of a child activity. The workflow runtime disallows cancellation of a child activity that is not in the Executing state.

    public void CancelActivity (System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity activity);

    Parameters

    • activity
      Activity

      The canceled Activity.

    Exceptions

    • ArgumentNullException

      activity is null.

    • ArgumentException

      activity is not a valid child of the ActivityExecutionContext. This means that either the argument is equal to the associated stem.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.Activity* or that the argument is not in the commented state and is a child of the stem.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.Activity* associated with this ActivityExecutionContext.

    • ObjectDisposedException

      The ActivityExecutionContext has been disposed.

    • InvalidOperationException

      activity is not in the Executing state.

  • CloseActivity()

    Indicates to the workflow runtime that the currently executing activity should transition to the Closed state.

    public void CloseActivity ();

    Exceptions

    • InvalidOperationException

      The status of the associated stem.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.Activity* is not equal to Executing or Canceling or Compensating or Closed.

    • ObjectDisposedException

      The disposed ActivityExecutionContext.

  • ExecuteActivity(Activity)

    Called by a composite activity to schedule the execution of a child activity. The workflow runtime disallows execution of a child activity that is not in the initialized state.

    public void ExecuteActivity (System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity activity);

    Parameters

    • activity
      Activity

      The executed Activity.

    Exceptions

    • ArgumentNullException

      activity is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).

    • ArgumentException

      activity is not a valid child of the ActivityExecutionContext. This means that either the argument is equal to the associated stem.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.Activity* or that the argument is not in the commented state and is a child of the stem.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.Activity* associated with this ActivityExecutionContext.

    • InvalidOperationException

      The status is neither initialized nor Closed.

    • ObjectDisposedException

      The ActivityExecutionContext has been disposed.

    Remarks

    If the status is Closed, the Activity is initialized and executed.

  • GetService(Type)

    Returns a service of the specified type.

    public object GetService (Type serviceType);

    Parameters

    • serviceType
      Type

      The Type of the service.

    Returns

    • System.Object

      A service Object of the specified Type.

    Exceptions

    • ObjectDisposedException

      The ActivityExecutionContext has been disposed.

  • GetService<T>()

    Returns a service provider of the specified Type.

    public T GetService<T> ();

    Returns

    • T

      A service provider Object of the specified Type.

    Exceptions

    • ObjectDisposedException

      The ActivityExecutionContext has been disposed.

  • TrackData(Object)

    Invokes the track method for the associated stem.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.Activity*.

    public void TrackData (object userData);

    Parameters

    • userData
      System.Object

      An object that specifies the data to track.

    Exceptions

    • ArgumentNullException

      If userData is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).

    • ObjectDisposedException

      If the Activity associated with this instance is a null reference (Nothing).

    Remarks

    The tracking routine is defined as part of the interface provided by each activity. See comment in user-supplied custom code.

  • TrackData(String,Object)

    Invokes the track method for the associated stem.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.Activity*.

    public void TrackData (string userDataKey, object userData);

    Parameters

    • userDataKey
      String

      The member of userData to track.

    • userData
      System.Object

      The data to track.

    Exceptions

    • ArgumentNullException

      If userData is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).

    • ObjectDisposedException

      If the Activity associated with this instance is a null reference (Nothing).

    Remarks

    The tracking routine is defined as part of the interface provided by each activity. It is user supplied custom code.

Explicit Interface Implementations

  • IDisposable.Dispose()

    Releases all resources used by the ActivityExecutionContext.

    void IDisposable.Dispose ();
